CancellationPolicy.Description: The hotel allows cancellation without surcharge up to 2 days before arrival, from 24 hours due to arrival applies 1 night penalty. In case of No Show, or sudden early departure total booking amount will be charged.
CancellationPolicy.DesciptionPolicy: This is a non-modifiable booking. Once this reservation is confirmed, no changes or modifications to this booking will be allowed. Should a change be required (i.e. change travel dates, adding or subtracting a passenger, name change, room type or category change or to add a meal plan), it will be mandatory that you cancel the existing reservation and book a new reservation accepting the current rate and all of the new conditions.
